pullRequest.title: Enhancement/externalize error messages properties
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR would be able to support the following:


External properties file for managing messages in the application.


Support localization.


Message Locale is fetched from the client-side and is defaulted to English. In case the user picks a locale that is not supported,
we display an error notification to the user and switch to the previous valid locale.


Signed-off-by: ap891843 aman.prashant@broadcom.com
